thread.title: Russia 'could have' cost us the election says Robby Mook | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Russia 'could have' cost us the election says Robby Mook | Daily Mail Online

author: Nikki Schwab
title: Russia 'could have' cost us the election says Robby Mook | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad Russia 'could have' cost us the election says Hillary Clinton's former campaign manager - who compares the Trump ties to Watergate Hillary Clinton's former campaign manager Robby Mook called for more information to be released about the conversations Trump aides had with Russia Last week, the New York Times reported some of Trump's people had repeated contact with senior Russian intelligence officials through the campaign Trump, at his Thursday press conference, said 'Russia is fake news,' while his chief of staff Reince Priebus denied the ties on Fox News Sunday yesterday Mook suggested the situation smelled a lot like Watergate, with the president initialing saying there was no contact between his campaign and Russians 'The more we learn, the closer it gets to the president himself,' Mook said, pointing out that both times the Democratic National Committee was targeted There is zero evidence suggesting that the Trump campaign was in on efforts by the Russians to hack the DNC, even if the motivation was to aid the Republican Published: 17:00 GMT, 20 February 2017 | Updated: 21:13 GMT, 20 February 2017 51 shares
